TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FileCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class FileCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class FileCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

summary.span: 將管理位於程式碼組件 (Assembly) 上檔案的使用權限授權給符合成員資格條件的程式碼組件。

span.span: Grants permission to manipulate files located in the code assemblies to code assemblies that match the membership condition.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程式碼群組是建置組塊的程式碼存取安全性原則。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每個原則層級是由根程式碼群組可以有子程式碼群組所組成。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每一個子程式碼群組可以有自己的子程式碼群組。這個行為會延伸到任何數目的層級，進而形成樹狀。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每個程式碼群組有成員資格條件，可判斷指定的組件所屬是否會根據該組件的辨識項。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 成員資格符合指定的組件的唯一程式碼群組和其子程式碼群組套用原則。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 具有相同語意與比對的子系。 has the same child matching semantics as . 不過，傳回權限集，其中包含動態計算，授與檔案存取權的目錄，從中執行程式碼;只會傳回靜態權限集。However, returns a permission set containing a dynamically-calculated that grants file access to the directory from which the code is run; only returns a static permission set. 檔案存取權授與的類型是當做參數傳遞給建構函式。The type of file access granted is passed as a parameter to the constructor. 這個程式碼群組只會符合執行透過檔案通訊協定，亦即，具有指向檔案或 UNC 路徑的 Url 的組件的組件。This code group only matches assemblies run over a file protocol, that is, assemblies that have URLs that point to a file or UNC path. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用成員的類別。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立基本的程式碼群組。This constructor creates a basic code group. 可以加入子程式碼群組會有方法。Child code groups can be added with the method. 傳回含有動態計算使用權限集合，授與檔案存取權的程式碼執行的目錄。 returns a permission set containing a dynamically-calculated that grants file access to the directory from which the code is run. 授與存取權的類型由`access`參數。The type of access granted is determined by the `access` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用建構函式。The following code shows the use of the constructor. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 製作目前程式碼群組的深層複本 (Deep Copy)。

span.span: Makes a deep copy of the current code group.

returns.span: 目前程式碼群組的相等複本，包含它的成員資格條件和子程式碼群組。

span.span: An equivalent copy of the current code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這樣也會套用程式碼群組包含的所有物件的複本，此方法會讓程式碼群組的深層複本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, so that copies of all objects the code group contains are also made. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法以進行程式碼群組的深層複本。The following code shows the use of the method to make a deep copy of the code group. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve (System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
public: override System::Security::Policy::PolicyStatement ^ Resolve(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ evidence);

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 解析程式碼群組的原則和其辨識項集合的子代。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 原則陳述式，包含由程式碼群組使用選擇性屬性授與的使用權限，或為 ，如果程式碼群組無法套用 (成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項)。

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件的辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，這個方法會傳回程式碼群組，包括評估子程式碼群組的原則陳述式。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. .NET Framework 安全性系統會使用來判斷哪些權限可授與要載入的程式碼，從產生的原則陳述式和程式碼要求組件上的原則層級上。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. form 為基礎的權限集合和使用等位的語意所指定`evidence`。 uses union semantics and forms a permission set based on the specified by `evidence`. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法來解決程式碼群組原則。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve policy for the code group. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups (System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
public: override System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup ^ ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ evidence);

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 解析符合的程式碼群組。

span.span: Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: ，是符合程式碼群組的樹狀結構的根 (Root)。

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件的辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，這個方法會傳回根程式碼群組。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 傳回的程式碼群組包含子程式碼群組，也可以有子程式碼群組，以反映一組完整的程式碼群組，以符合所提供的辨識項，視。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided. form 為基礎的權限集合和使用等位的語意所指定`evidence`。 uses union semantics and forms a permission set based on the specified by `evidence`. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法來解決相符程式碼群組。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve matching code groups. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FileCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
